name: geo_suite
description: ReEarth_GeoSuite: Re:Earth版 geo_suite を目指す統合プラグイン／ツール集

scripts.build: tsc -p geo_suite/tsconfig.json && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -r geo_suite/build/* dist/ || true && cp -r index.html ryu.html dist/ || true && cp -r image dist/ || true && mkdir -p dist/artifacts && rm -rf release && mkdir -p release && cp dist/layers-and-tiles-list.js release/ || true && if [ -f plugin/reearth.yml ]; then cp plugin/reearth.yml release/; fi && (cd release && zip -r ../dist/artifacts/geo_suite.zip .) || true && mkdir -p /vercel/output/static && cp -r dist/* /vercel/output/static || true

author: yamamoto-ryuzo
